channel.title: Spacemacs on Katherine's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spacemacs on Katherine's Blog

item.title: Migrating habituated cut copy and paste into Emacs
item.description: In order to get as versitile as possible, I try to avoid re-config keybindings in different operating environment. I made myself to get used to the environment, for example there are about four or five different settings in Emacs, VIM, bash, Windows OS and other terminal. Overall speaking, I find this brings me more benefit than the cost of learning or migrating customerized config to other environment. In most cases, it’s just *nix (VIM, Emacs) v.

item.title: Using aspell in windows 10 and Emacs 26 above 【拼写检查 Emacs26 使用更新版 aspell】
item.description: Installing aspell for Emacs 26+ in windows system.
